p.b: The word season has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the answer in which season means "to add more flavor to something."

simpleChoice.p: So he can play better chess, I will season my brother by teaching him strategies.
Dad says his least favorite season is winter because he hates to shovel snow.
Blueberries will taste better this summer when they are in season.
If mom seasons the vegetables with herbs and spices, my brother will eat them.
